page.title: 13The Fox-Pakenham's Pub
page.content: My name is Tina.My parents own the Pub.We have lived in this Pub for 3 years.Mum enjoys meeting new people.The worst part of the job is working every night of the week.It is not a free house.It is owned by Greene King.On a good night we serve 60 people.Friday night,Saturday and Sunday are the busiest times.We open at 11am - 2.30pm and 7pm - 11pm.People can play darts and pool.We have lots of different beers.We sell about 480 pints of draught beer per week,40 dozen bottled beers and 10 dozen soft drinks.We have a big cool room to keep our beer in .We have hot and cold food for sale. In the evening my mum empties the ashtrays and washes the glasses before she goes to bed. In the morning Mum polishes the floor and cleans up.I clean the windows.
